enchantment_lore.keepinv:safekeep.descri:
Compatible with: Armor

Keep all items on death at the cost of 33% item durability
enchantment_lore.keepinv:deathlock.descr:
Compatible with: Chestplates

Items lost/Graves created on death can only be obtained by one self
enchantment_lore.keepinv:gravehold.descr:
Compatible with: Chestplates

Items/Graves dropped on death will stay there for double the time before they disappear
text.keepinv.no_saved_inventory: No inventory saved for this player.
menu.keepinv.title: Nice Keep Inventory: Settings
menu.keepinv.config.main.title: Nice Keep Inventory: Admin Menu
menu.keepinv.restore.description: Proceeding will reset all configured values. Do you want to continue?
menu.keepinv.restore.title: Restore Default Values
menu.keepinv.config.restore_inv.title: Restore Player Inventory
menu.keepinv.config.restore_inv.desc:
Restore a players inventory they had before they last died.
The items will always spawn/be placed at your current position.

The Player needs to be online!
menu.keepinv.uninstall.description: Proceeding removes all needed entries. Certain Progress will be lost forever. Don't forget to delete the Nice Keep Inventory file afterwards.
menu.keepinv.uninstall.description_2: Keep in mind that already existing Items, Entities, generated Loot and Structures can't be removed automatically.
